name: Millennium Wedge De Luxe 35x35x7 cm.
descr:
Millennium Sitting Wedge 10 Degrees

The Chiroform Sitting Wedge bring you back to natural posture, so that your back suffers no unnecessary strain. In addition, the wedge supports the pelvis and thighs to prevent numbness in the legs.

Ultra comfortable U-cut for coccyx patients.

The Chiroform Sitting Wedge is made from moulded glued foam and covered with 1 cm viscoelastic memory foam.

Delivered with a soft and comfortable velvet cover. Stitched inner cover.
